title: I Rule World
description: This is a story of a clever little boy Balu who has a hard time with his new taunting gift and friend World. She mocks him and has the last laugh all the time. How does Balu learn to have a good time with her? This is the first book in the Balu series. In this book Balu gets a new gift World. But annoys her and finally, he learns to understand her. This beginner readerâ€™s eBook will teach your child about history of human life and their foolishness, purpose of life and will inspire your kids to be aware of the environment and the responsibility of humans towards mother Earth. Your kids will enjoy cute full-color illustrations of Balu and the World. I rule World! is a sweet children's book written especially for you and your kids ages 2- 8. With simple text and 14 colorful illustrations. The story is suitable as a read aloud book for preschoolers or a self-read book for beginner readers.
author: Ruthz S.B.
